robust geographical detector(RGD)

Source: vignettes/robust-geodetector.Rmd
robust-geodetector.Rmd

Set up your python dependence

    1. install miniconda
    1. create a new conda env geocompy use conda create -n geocompy python=3.9 -y
    1. activate this env conda activate geocompy
    1. install mamba by conda install -c conda-forge mamba -y.
    1. set up python packages use mamba install -c conda-forge numpy==1.23.5 pandas ruptures -y 
library(gdverse)
reticulate::use_condaenv('geocompy')
rpt
## Module(ruptures)
